column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Everything about Bavette's is excellent.  The decor and ambiance are great.  The restaurant is reminiscent of a speakeasy or a wainscoted library.  It is a dark and inviting space with rich wood and exposed brick.  The drinks are expertly crafted
column3: and the food is to die for.  Not only are the steaks amazing
column4: but the sides are extremely rich and flavorful.  Probably also a thousand calories a piece containing no less than three sticks of butter
